new_skill_specs.name: analyze_diagram_for_angle
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze a geometric diagram to infer the measure of a specified angle.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The inferred measure of the specified angle as a float.
edge_cases: Diagram is unclear or elements are not properly labeled.
Multiple angles could be inferred due to ambiguous markers.

new_skill_specs.name: map_inferred_angle_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the inferred angle measure to the closest multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the closest matching option.
edge_cases: Inferred angle does not match any option closely.
